printed_text:
Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed.
Limit 6 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, reveal any number of copies of Fear the Masses from your grip. The Corp trashes X cards from the top of R&D, where X is equal to 1 plus the number of cards you revealed. Limit 6 per deck.

printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.

flavor: "They don't want to listen, so we'll just have to crank up the volume."
printed_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.

printed_text:
The Corp cannot win the game except if you are flatlined.
When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this resource. If there are 3 or more hosted power counters, remove this resource from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: The Corp cannot win the game except if you are flatlined. When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on this resource. If there are 3 or more hosted power counters, remove this resource from the game. Limit 1 per deck.

printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed connection resource. The Corp cannot advance cards during their next turn. Remove this event from the game.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed connection resource. The Corp cannot advance cards during their next turn. Remove this event from the game.

printed_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever this program fully breaks a barrier, add that barrier to HQ. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

printed_text:
Secretly spend up to 2[credit]. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
stripped_printed_text: Secretly spend up to 2 credits. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, choose a piece of ice protecting a server and run that server. The first time during this run you encounter the chosen ice, bypass it. Errata from CR 1.4

flavor: "When the enemy has mastered the battlefield, change the battlefield." -The Playbook
printed_text:
When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Move that program onto this ice.
Each hosted program loses all abilities.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Move that program onto this ice. Each hosted program loses all abilities. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: "Practical effects are expensive, but worth it. I had to smash seventeen stunt bioroids to get this shot." -Parvati Kapoor, director
printed_text: Gain 4[credit]. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).
stripped_printed_text: Gain 4 credits. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).

flavor: They eat us, we eat them, the cycle goes on and on. -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
printed_text: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4 credits.

printed_text:
Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area.
You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area. You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.

printed_text: While the Runner is tagged, they play with the grip revealed.
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is tagged, they play with the grip revealed.

flavor: The costumes aren't strictly necessary, but they improve the performances of the vactors and sensie stars.
printed_text:
Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas.
The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
stripped_printed_text: Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas. The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.

printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.
stripped_printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance nbn cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.

printed_text: During runs on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on their installed cards except for mid-access abilities and abilities on icebreakers. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: During runs on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on their installed cards except for mid-access abilities and abilities on icebreakers. Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text:
Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged.
[click], 1[credit]: Give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged. click, 1 credit: Give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "A new administration means we have to start greasing the wheels all over again. Let's get to work."
printed_text: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.

flavor: Judicious use of freelancers can increase efficiency and protect the company from legal repercussions. It's what they call a "win-win".
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.

flavor: Survival of the fittest' is so outdated; in finance it's 'survival of the fattest.' -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
printed_text: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
stripped_printed_text: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
